channel.title: Ebiten "games" on JO Jaeyoung | 조재영
channel.description: Recent content in Ebiten "games" on JO Jaeyoung | 조재영

item.title: Find Shortest Path
item.description: Click on empty region with alt/option key to create a node. Click two nodes in sequence to create a weighted (distance) edge between the nodes. Press ’s' key to perform shortest path search.

item.title: Simple Harmonic Oscillator
item.description: keyboard controls s : Start/stop toggle left arrow/right arrow : Adjust position up arrow/down arrow : Adjust velocity

item.title: Pancho's Adventures (WIP)
item.description: Play Description Pancho’s Adventures is an epic high-fantasy game that follows the exploits of the eponymous hero Pancho. https://ebiten.org
